value:
$WmMPID_クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Normal,Face|Let's...try this one more time.$k$p$WmMPID_クリス女,ch01_38_Chris_F_Normal,Face|Yes...let's.$k$p$WmMPID_クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Normal,Face|My name is Kris.$k$pI'm a soldier in the 7th Platoon
of Altea's army.$k$p$WmMPID_クリス女,ch01_38_Chris_F_Normal,Face|My name is also Kris.$k$pI'm also a soldier in the 7th Platoon
of Altea's army.$k$p$WmMPID_クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Normal,Face|What is the name of the village
you grew up in?$k$p$WmMPID_クリス女,ch01_38_Chris_F_Normal,Face|Sera. Who is your grandfather?$k$p$WmMPID_クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Normal,Face|MacLear.$k$p$WmMPID_クリス女,ch01_38_Chris_F_Normal,Face|Our lives are...identical.$k$p$WmMPID_クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Normal,Face|It seems so.$k$p$WmMPID_ジュリアン,ch01_39_Julian_M_Normal,Face|Same names, titles, histories... Only
difference between you is gender.$k$pNeat. What do you think, Lena?$k$p$WmMPID_レナ,ch01_40_Lena_F_Normal,Face|At a glance, they are different people.
But looking closely... They do seem
to have the same presence.$k$p$WmMPID_クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Normal,Face|Let's try some deeper questions.
How do you prefer to deal with
your injuries?$k$p$WmMPID_クリス女,ch01_38_Chris_F_Normal,Face|Training right through them is the
only thing that's comfortable. What
was your grandfather's wish for you?$k$p$WmMPID_クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Normal,Face|"Kris, become the sword of Altea.
Acquire an unbreakable strength
and devotion."$k$p$WmMPID_クリス女,ch01_38_Chris_F_Normal,Face|We are the same person.$k$p$WmMPID_クリス男,ch01_37_Chris_M_Normal,Face|Two different worlds, but the same
exact life experiences...$k$p$WmMPID_ジュリアン,ch01_39_Julian_M_Normal,Face|Askr's never short on surprises.$k$p$WmMPID_レナ,ch01_40_Lena_F_Normal,Face|From what I understand, this sort of
occurrence is actually rather
commonplace here...$k$pKris, Kris, I look forward to working
with both of you moving forward.$k$p$WmMPID_クリス女,ch01_38_Chris_F_Normal,Face|Julian, Lena, it's very good to see
you both. Let's continue to combine
our strength together on the field.$k$p$WmMPID_ジュリアン,ch01_39_Julian_M_Normal,Face|Ah, well...for us, this is actually more
of a first meeting, since the Kris in
our world was...$k$pOh, that's not important! It's great
to meet you.$k$p$WmMPID_クリス女,ch01_38_Chris_F_Normal,Face|You mean the Kris you knew
was a man. Both of you?$k$p$WmMPID_レナ,ch01_40_Lena_F_Normal,Face|Yes, that's right.$k$p$WmMPID_クリス女,ch01_38_Chris_F_Normal,Face|So no one here is actually...
from my own world?$k$pTo you I am only some kind of...
alternate version?$k$p
